title: AZ-900 Azure Fundamentals - 이미지 문제 샘플
description: DRAG DROP, Hot Area, Hotspot 문제 예시

questions.question: [샘플] You need to match Azure services to their appropriate categories. Drag each service to the correct category.
questions.imageDescription: Azure services categorization diagram with empty boxes
questions.explanation: All mappings are correct: VM and App Service are compute; Blob Storage is storage; SQL Database is a database service.

questions.question: [샘플] You are viewing the Azure Portal. You need to identify where to find the subscription ID. Select the appropriate area in the screenshot.
questions.imageDescription: Azure Portal screenshot showing subscription overview page

options.text: The Subscription ID field in the Overview section

questions.explanation: The Subscription ID is clearly displayed in the Overview section of the subscription details page.

questions.question: [샘플] Review the network security group (NSG) rules shown in the diagram. For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
questions.imageDescription: Network Security Group rules table showing inbound and outbound rules

options.text: Statement 1: HTTP traffic on port 80 is allowed from the internet → YES
Statement 2: SSH traffic on port 22 is blocked from all sources → NO
Statement 3: All outbound traffic to the internet is allowed → YES
Statement 4: RDP traffic on port 3389 is allowed from specific IP → YES

questions.explanation: Based on the NSG rules: HTTP (80) is allowed inbound, SSH (22) is allowed from specific IPs (not blocked from all), outbound traffic is allowed by default, and RDP (3389) is allowed from a specific IP address.
